question.title: Failed to bind properties under retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities to jackson.core.StreamWriteCapability
question.body:
Error starting ApplicationContext. To display the condition evaluation report re-run your application with 'debug' enabled.
2025-04-01T15:07:23.041+05:30 ERROR 33273 --- [pnp-reporting] [           main] o.s.b.d.LoggingFailureAnalysisReporter   : 

***************************
APPLICATION FAILED TO START
***************************

Description:

Failed to bind properties under 'services.retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities' to com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.JacksonFeatureSet<com.fasterxml.jackson.core.StreamWriteCapability>:

    Reason: org.springframework.boot.context.properties.bind.BindException: Failed to bind properties under 'services.retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities' to com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.JacksonFeatureSet<com.fasterxml.jackson.core.StreamWriteCapability>

Action:

Update your application's configuration


Process finished with exit code 1

Also tried adding the following in application.properties:

services.retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities[0]=CAN_WRITE_BINARY_NATIVELY
services.retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities[1]=CAN_WRITE_FORMATTED_NUMBERS

Still same issue, please suggest fix.

Following is how my pom.xml looks:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>3.2.0</version>
        <relativePath/>
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.demo.app</groupId>
    <artifactId>pnp-reporting</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <name>pnp-reporting</name>
    <url/>
    <licenses>
        <license/>
    </licenses>
    <developers>
        <developer/>
    </developers>
    <scm>
        <connection/>
        <developerConnection/>
        <tag/>
        <url/>
    </scm>
    <properties>
        <java.version>21</java.version>
<!--        <jackson.core.version>2.15.3</jackson.core.version>-->
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.kafka</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-kafka</artifactId>
            <version>3.1.0</version> <!-- Spring Kafka version that works with Spring 3.2.2 -->
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.vladmihalcea</groupId>
            <artifactId>hibernate-types-60</artifactId>
            <version>2.21.0</version> <!-- Latest version compatible with Hibernate 6.x -->
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.hibernate.orm</groupId>
            <artifactId>hibernate-core</artifactId>
            <version>6.0.0.Final</version> <!-- Ensure you're using Hibernate 6.x -->
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.hibernate.validator</groupId>
            <artifactId>hibernate-validator</artifactId>
            <version>7.0.5.Final</version> <!-- Match with Spring Boot 3.2.0 compatibility -->
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
            <artifactId>jackson-core</artifactId>
            <version>2.16.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
            <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
            <version>2.16.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
            <artifactId>jackson-annotations</artifactId>
            <version>2.16.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>jakarta.persistence</groupId>
            <artifactId>jakarta.persistence-api</artifactId>
            <version>3.1.0</version> <!-- Latest version for Jakarta Persistence -->
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
            <artifactId>poi-ooxml</artifactId>
            <version>5.2.3</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
            <artifactId>poi</artifactId>
            <version>5.2.3</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.xmlbeans</groupId>
            <artifactId>xmlbeans</artifactId>
            <version>5.1.1</version>
        </dependency>


        <!-- Kafka Client dependency -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.kafka</groupId>
            <artifactId>kafka-clients</artifactId>
            <version>3.4.0</version> <!-- Ensure compatibility with Kafka 3.x series -->
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId>
            <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId>
            <scope>runtime</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-bootstrap</artifactId>
        </dependency>


        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.hibernate.orm</groupId>
            <artifactId>hibernate-envers</artifactId>
            <version>6.0.0.Final</version>
        </dependency>


        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
            <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-mail</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
            <scope>compile</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-collections4</artifactId>
            <version>4.4</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.retrofit2</groupId>
            <artifactId>retrofit</artifactId>
            <version>2.9.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- Retrofit Gson Converter -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.retrofit2</groupId>
            <artifactId>converter-gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.9.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.0</version>
            <type>pom</type>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-ui</artifactId>
            <version>1.6.15</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-cloud-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>2023.0.0</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.22.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <skipTests>true</skipTests>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>

I have tried various versions of Jackson-core and retrofit2.

@Component
@ConfigurationProperties("services.retro-fit-client.mapper.serializer-provider.generator.write-capabilities")
@Data
@Slf4j
public class RetroFitClient {

question_comments.body: For starters stop trying to outsmart the Spring Boot dependecy management. Ditch the hibernate-core and persistence-api dependencies, those are already pulled in by` spring-boot-starter-data-jpa. Ditch the hibernate-validator` dependency and add spring-boot-starter-validation. Ditch the jackson dependencies those are already part of spring-boot-starter-web. Ditch slf4j-api, the version from hibernate-envers. Finally the springdoc-openapi dependencies need a newer version as afaik those are incompatible.
